solution_line_template: There are {days_in_week} days in a week, so if he doesn't go to work for {days_not_work} days, he goes {days_in_week}-{days_not_work} = <<{days_in_week}-{days_not_work}={days_work_per_week}>>{days_work_per_week} days every week
He travels {distance_per_day}km each day for a weekly total of {distance_per_day}*{days_work_per_week} = <<{distance_per_day}*{days_work_per_week}={distance_per_week}>>{distance_per_week}km
In {num_weeks} weeks he will travel a total of {num_weeks}*{distance_per_week} = <<{num_weeks}*{distance_per_week}={total_distance}>>{total_distance}km
